titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 2464: Perush

availability.licence: These images and the content of British Library Or 2464: Perush are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, British Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about British Library Or 2464: Perush. This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

notesStmt.note: All folios partially water-damaged and/or mutilated.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Two fragments of Judeo-Arabic commentary of Japheth ben Ali on Genesis.

supportDesc.extent: Part I: Folios 1-4. Part II: Folios 5-101.;

layoutDesc.layout: Part I: 1 column(s); ruled lines: 24; written lines: 24; Uniform layout. Part II: 1 column(s); ruled lines: 25; written lines: 25; Visible ruling with hard-point. Two blank lines are interposed between the end of a weekly section and the beginning of a new one.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Part I: Oriental square of 14th century.Part II: Oriental square script of 14th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Yefet. Commentary on Genesis. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2464.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [102v].
